typeSystemDescription.name: SHARPCommonTypeSystem
typeSystemDescription.description: This is a Common Type System for SHARP NLP. It includes general types necessary to store annotations and interface with clinical element models

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.structured.DocumentID
typeDescription.description: Equivalent to cTAKES: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.DocumentID, but its supertype changed to uima.cas.TOP

featureDescription.name: oui
featureDescription.description: holds the rxnorm unique identifier for a given drug mention. TODO: change this attribute because of name clash (UMLS/SNOMED)

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.textsem.ContextAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Contextual information of an entity. Equivalent to cTAKES: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.context.type.ContextAnnotation

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.refsem.Element
typeDescription.description: A basic semantic unit, mappable to an ontology. Includes things like Entities, Events, Attributes, Dates.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.refsem.Time
typeDescription.description: A normalized form for Time annotations. Inherits from Element, but some fields may be unused.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.refsem.Date
typeDescription.description: A normalized form for dates, namely with day, month, and year. A subtype of Element but may not use all inherited attributes.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.refsem.Event
typeDescription.description: An event, which may bear some temporal properties and relationships.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.refsem.Attribute
typeDescription.description: The semantic encapsulation of a modifer. E.g., for Clinical Elements, Attributes may be used to specify Body Side for a Procedure.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.refsem.EventProperties
typeDescription.description: A set of mostly temporal properties that are unique to Events.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.relation.Affects
typeDescription.description: A UMLS relation between clinical elements.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.relation.ResultOf
typeDescription.description: A UMLS relation between clinical elements.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.relation.ManifestationOf
typeDescription.description: A UMLS relation between clinical elements.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.relation.LocationOf
typeDescription.description: A UMLS relation between clinical elements.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.relation.DegreeOf
typeDescription.description: A UMLS relation between an attribute and an entity/event.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.structured.Demographics
typeDescription.description: Demographic information about the patient in a clinical document. Attributes come from Clinical Element Models (CEMs).

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.structured.Metadata
typeDescription.description: Other structured data that captures information about the document, patient, or context of the clinical text.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.syntax.TreebankNode
typeDescription.description: A Penn Treebank-style tree node. Conforms to PTB 2.0 guidelines.

featureDescription.name: headIndex
featureDescription.description: The head index tracks the index into the word tokens which is the syntactic head of a phrase.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.syntax.TerminalTreebankNode
typeDescription.description: A Penn Treebank Node; as a terminal, there is an associated word, and the index of the word is an attribute.

featureDescription.name: index
featureDescription.description: The index of this node in the top node's list of terminals.

featureDescription.name: tokenIndex
featureDescription.description: The tokenIndex of a terminal is n, where the terminal is the nth token in a sentence. The value -1 means that this terminal does not correspond to a token (because it is a trace.) We assume that each token corresponds to a terminal.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.syntax.TopTreebankNode
typeDescription.description: A Penn Treebank Node; as the top node, this stores the whole subsumed sentence's parse tree as a string. It also stores all the terminals, allowing for traversal of the tree bottom-up (top-down is implied through the TreebankNode's 'children' attribute).

featureDescription.name: treebankParse
featureDescription.description: A bracketed sentence string representing the parse tree.

featureDescription.name: terminals
featureDescription.description: Stores the terminal nodes of the parse tree. This allows for bottom-up traversal of a tree.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.syntax.ConllDependencyNode
typeDescription.description: A dependency parser node in the CONLL-X format, namely, where each node is a token with 10 fields.

featureDescription.name: id
featureDescription.description: The token's position in the sentence. The ROOT node, present in every dependency parse, has id=0.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.syntax.StanfordDependency
typeDescription.description: Stanford dependencies provide a representation of grammatical relations between words in a sentence. Stanford dependencies are triplets: name of the relation, governor and dependent.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.syntax.SemanticRole
typeDescription.description: Semantic roles according to the PropBank standard. The "category" as used here can be any of 7 numbered arguments or 15 modifier labels.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.textsem.IdentifiedAnnotation
typeDescription.description: More generalized from cTAKES: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.IdentifiedAnnotation. Any span of text that has been discovered or flagged for some reason, such as a Named Entity. Allows for mapping to an ontology.

featureDescription.name: typeID
featureDescription.description: The type of named entity (e.g. drug, disorder, ...)

featureDescription.name: sentenceID
featureDescription.description: contains the sentence id of the sentence that contains the NE's text span

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.textsem.EntityMention
typeDescription.description: A text string (IdentifiedAnnotation) that refers to an Entity.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.textsem.EventMention
typeDescription.description: A text string (IdentifiedAnnotation) that refers to an Event.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.textsem.TimeMention
typeDescription.description: A text string (IdentifiedAnnotation) that refers to a Time (i.e., TIMEX3).

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.textsem.Modifier
typeDescription.description: A text string (IdentifiedAnnotation) that refers to an Attribute.

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.util.Pair
typeDescription.description: An Attribute-Value tuple. Equivalent to cTAKES: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.Property

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.util.Pairs
typeDescription.description: A brute force "hash" that stores multiple Pairs in a list. Equivalent to cTAKES: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.Properties

typeDescription.name: edu.mayo.bmi.uima.core.type.util.ProbabilityDistribution
typeDescription.description: A brute force probability distribution for discrete variables.
